title: Annual Academic Celebration and Ceremony 2025
description: Week-long celebration of academic achievements with public events, new professor appointments, and keynote lectures.

title: The 2nd Annual Organisation Studies Symposium
description: The symposium will take place at Malmö University and will include lunch and dinner on 18 September. For the symposium, we plan a varied programme with invited keynote speakers combined with sessions, where you are invited to present and discuss your work in organisation studies.

title: BRCB — The Annual Workshop at Biofilms Research Centre
description: Biofilms Research Centre for Biointerfaces invites you to the 20th Annual workshop on 23-24 October 2025. This year the workshop will focus on water research. We will discuss bulk properties of water, water at interfaces and nanoconfinements, as well as industrial and environmental aspects related to water.

title: Migration seminar: Children and youth empowerment through sports
description: Participatory Action Research with sport-for-development initiatives in Sweden and Uganda. This research builds on the belief that to effectively facilitate sport-related social inclusion and integration, there is need for increased empowerment and meaningful participation of beneficiaries in planning, implementation and evaluation of sport-related social initiatives.

title: PhD Summer School: Building theory in STEM education research
description: International PhD course to develop theoretical framing and methodology in science and technology education.

title: The Nordic Police Research Seminar
description: An interdisciplinary conference that brings together researchers in different fields of science but has a common focus on issues related to police organization, operations and training.

title: Europe Day 2025
description: Celebration of European unity and values with performances and speeches.

title: Verdi's Requiem
description: Malmö Academic Choir and Orchestra performing this monumental choral work.

title: Doctoral school: Sustainable Movement Education
description: Interdisciplinary doctoral program focusing on physical activity, health, and societal change.

title: Biofilms Research Centre for Biointerfaces
description: Research on water at interfaces, nanoconfinements, and industrial/environmental applications.

title: Citizen Health
description: Community-based participatory research on health equity and urban well-being.

title: Aminah quit addiction – became a social worker and CEO
description: When Aminah Fallgren became drug-free, she started dreaming of helping others. The social worker programme at Malmö University eventually led her to start the treatment group SONA Connect & Academy, where she is now CEO – offering both treatment and education.

title: Alexandru wants to raise awareness of climate change
description: In recent years, Alexandru Al-Qassam has established himself as one of Sweden's most influential figures in sustainability. With his committed work to advance the UN Sustainable Development Goals and his passion for environmental issues, he has inspired and influenced both regionally and nationally.

title: Contemporary Visual Art Exhibition
description: A curated collection of works by contemporary artists redefining visual art.

title: Acrylic Painting Workshop
description: Learn acrylic painting techniques from a professional artist.

title: Modern Sculpture Exhibition
description: Display of modern sculptural works made from diverse materials: metal, wood, glass.

title: Best Painting Competition
description: Open competition for amateur and professional artists to showcase their best painting.

title: Interactive Art Show: You Are Part of the Painting
description: An interactive art experience where the visitor becomes part of the artwork.

title: Collage Art Workshop
description: Learn the art of assembling materials to create innovative artworks.

title: Street Art (Graffiti) Exhibition
description: Display of graffiti and street art by local and international artists.

title: Art Auction
description: Public auction of original artworks from private collections.

title: Printmaking Art Workshop
description: Learn manual printing techniques: wood, metal, silk screen.

title: Light Installation Art Exhibition
description: Exhibition of interactive light installations creating enchanting visual worlds.

title: Abstract Photography Workshop
description: Learn how to capture abstract photos that carry an artistic message.

title: Postmodern Art Exhibition
description: Artworks that challenge traditional concepts and raise existential questions.

title: Live Painting Performance
description: Artists painting live artworks in front of the audience during show hours.

title: Black and White Photography Workshop
description: Learn black and white photography and professional image editing.

title: Pop Art Exhibition
description: Works inspired by pop culture: ads, cartoon characters, consumer symbols.

title: Digital Art Workshop
description: Learn to use digital drawing software to create stunning artworks.

title: Surrealism Art Exhibition
description: Artworks that take you into dream worlds and the subconscious.

title: Drone Photography Workshop
description: Learn to photograph landscapes from above using drones professionally.

title: Expressionism Art Exhibition
description: Artworks expressing inner emotions through a dramatic and bold style.

title: Macro Photography Workshop
description: Learn to photograph fine details in nature and small objects.

title: Documentary Art Photography Exhibition
description: Photographs with a documentary style but high artistic aesthetics.

title: Long Exposure Photography Workshop
description: Learn to photograph water and light movement using long exposure.

title: Conceptual Photography Exhibition
description: Photographs carrying deep philosophical and intellectual concepts.

title: Portrait Photography Workshop
description: Learn to capture portraits that express human personality and soul.

title: Sound Installation Art Exhibition
description: An artistic experience combining sound and space to create an immersive environment.

title: Vintage Film Photography Workshop
description: Learn to use film cameras and experience the old magic of photography.

title: Chinese Ink Painting Workshop
description: Learn traditional techniques of Chinese ink painting.

title: Traditional Music Festival
description: Live performances of folk music from various regions.

title: Theatrical Performance: One Thousand and One Nights
description: A theatrical performance inspired by the tales of One Thousand and One Nights.

title: Short Story Competition
description: A competition to write the best short story with valuable prizes.

title: Mosaic Making Workshop
description: Learn the art of mosaic-making as practiced in ancient times.

title: Cultural Trip to Heritage Villages
description: A trip to discover traditional lifestyles in ancient villages.

title: Evening of Classical Arabic Music
description: Performance of the most beautiful classical Arabic musical pieces.

title: Eastern Carpets Exhibition
description: Exhibition of the most beautiful hand-made Eastern carpets.
